account_id.description: The ID of the Facebook Ads account associated with the campaign.

adlabels.description: Labels associated with the ad campaigns.

id.description: The ID of the ad label.

name.description: The name of the ad label.

created_time.description: The date and time when the ad label was created.

updated_time.description: The date and time when the ad label was last updated.

bid_strategy.description: The bid strategy used for the campaign.

boosted_object_id.description: The ID of the boosted object associated with the campaign.

budget_rebalance_flag.description: A flag indicating whether the budget is set to rebalance.

budget_remaining.description: The remaining budget for the campaign.

buying_type.description: The type of buying for the campaign.

daily_budget.description: The daily budget set for the campaign.

created_time.description: The date and time when the campaign was created.

configured_status.description: The configured status of the campaign.

effective_status.description: The effective status of the campaign.

issues_info.description: Information on any issues related to the campaigns.

error_code.description: The error code associated with the issue.

error_message.description: The error message describing the issue.

error_summary.description: A summary of the error associated with the issue.

level.description: The severity level of the issue.

lifetime_budget.description: The lifetime budget set for the campaign.

smart_promotion_type.description: The type of smart promotion used for the campaign.

source_campaign_id.description: The ID of the source campaign, if any.

special_ad_category.description: The special ad category associated with the campaign.

special_ad_category_country.description: The country associated with the special ad category.

spend_cap.description: The spend cap set for the campaign.

start_time.description: The start date and time of the campaign.

stop_time.description: The end date and time of the campaign.

updated_time.description: The date and time when the campaign was last updated.
